pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.1.10: Sp.2.634: Maṇḍalabaddhaṃ salākabaddhanti idaṃ pana tiṇṇampi chattānaṃ pañjaradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tāni hi maṇḍalabaddhāni ceva honti salākabaddhāni ca. “Maṇḍalabaddhaṃ salākabaddhan: this is said for the purpose of showing the frame of the three sunshades. For they are bound at the rim (maṇḍalabaddha) and bound at the ribs (salākabaddha).”
